1.0.name: wordpress/wolframalpha-widget
1.0.description:
Build your own widget or simply browse thousands of widgets in the gallery on a wide range of topics, including mathematics, physics, transportation, health, statistics, astronomy, chemistry, dates, time calculations, earth sciences, engineering, food & nutrition, money & finance, geography, socioeconomic data, units & measures, weather, words & linguistics, and more. With the Wolfram|Alpha Widget Sidebar Plugin you can embed live, interactive computational knowledge directly into your WordPress sidebar.

http://developer.wolframalpha.com/widgets
